Genre: Racing
Developer: 3dinteger
Year: 2013
Platform: Android
Format:. Apk
Version: 1.0
Language: English


System requirements:
==========================
Android version 2.2 and higher


Setting:
======================

1) Install APK

2) Play!





If possible try to describe briefly the application Dirt Road Trucker 3D,
you get a simulator of the Russian-Ukrainian roads.

In this game you will play the role of a truck driver who needs
to transport goods from one point to another. The only major problem
and performs off-road, due to which the cargo may fall out of the car.
But the delay is also not recommended, because the timer is running,and
the faster way to travel, the better. Of course, the products will vary,
but in them and their number. Barrels, boxes, pumpkin, logs, etc. - all
this will have to apply his approach. The graphics in this game is cute,
certainly better than many of the available truckers.
It's time behind the wheel!
